dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_num, loc1.location_xid carrier, TO_CHAR(cv.departure_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') sail_date, TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') eta, glog_util.remove_domain(cv.insert_user) insert_user, TO_CHAR(cv.insert_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') insert_date, glog_util.remove_domain(cv.update_user) update_user, TO_CHAR(cv.update_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') update_date FROM charter_voyage cv LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND cv.departure_date >= TO_DATE('2016-09-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(cv.arrival_date, cv.departure_date) > 5
